name: Dice Equation
description:
Use the dice to complete the simple math equations!
Don't have the right numbers on your dice? Then keep rolling and finish the equation before the timer runs out! 

This is an entry to 2-day GMTK Gamejam 2022

Control:
  • Click on the dice to reroll
  • Drag the dice to all the empty slots in the equation
